column4: Connecticut ( CNN ) - - A judge in New Haven sentenced a 31 - year-old man to death Friday for his role in a deadly home invasion that killed a woman and her two daughters in 2007 .

column3: Jurors convicted Joshua Komisarjevsky in October on six capital felony charges .
The 12 - member jury had recommended death by lethal injection on each of the counts
